attributes.action: assign every house an e-mail address
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
every postal registered house should have an emal address, with say  five name options (occupant@10downingst.co.uk)
obviously it would be occupants choice whether they use it as would remain with home if sold, like a postcode

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
